Bingo Card Book Recommendations

Bingo Card All Books

Author Uses Initial

Bingo Square [12]

Read a book by an author who goes by their initials like N. K. Jemisin or uses initials somewhere in their name like George R. R. Martin. HARD MODE: Initials are a pseudonym and not from the author’s actual name. Examples: T. Kingfisher or K. J. Parker. ADDENDUM: Please do not go snooping to see if a name fits. If it isn't clear based on an author's webpage or social media, assume that it is their real name.

Title Author Hard Mode
A Declaration of the Rights of Magicians H.G. Parry
A Dowry of Blood S.T. Gibson
All the Murmuring Bones A.G. Slatter
Balam, Spring Travis M. Riddle
Dead Djinn Universe P. Djèlí Clark
Dim Stars: A Novel of Outer-Space Shenanigans Brian P. Rubin
Flesh Eater Travis M. Riddle
On Lavender Tides Travis M. Riddle
Orconomics J. Zachary Pike
Sea of Rust C. Robert Cargill
Spit and Song Travis M. Riddle
Stranger Back Home E.L. Haines
The Book of Koli M.R. Carey
The Etched City K. J. Bishop
The Expanse James S.A. Corey
The Hand of the Sun King J.T. Greathouse
The Narrows Travis M. Riddle
The Once and Future Witches Alix E. Harrow
The Poppy War R.F. Kuang
The Rise of Kyoshi FC Yee
The Sword of Kaigen M.L. Wang
This Quest is Broken! J.P. Valentine
Unnatural Magic CM Waggoner
We Are Legion (We Are Bob) Dennis E. Taylor
